Author: smittenkitt3n
Text: soylent was ridiculously convenient to me during finals when i was studying (and also on adderall lol). also, i would only drink 2 a day, so i was happy with the calorie content.   i had to stop, though, because for some reason, it made me feel gross afterwards every single time i’d drink it. i think my stomach just didn’t get along with an ingredient in it.   also, when i did drink it, i would get tired of the taste ‘cause i’d drink a box of the same flavor at a time. i recommend switching flavors. chocolate is really frickin tasty, and the coffee one tastes amazing
